word:
In the last days there are to be only two parties, the one on the right hand and the other on the left, 


                -37- 

and Christ says unto one, "Come, ye blessed of My Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world: for I was an hungered, and ye gave Me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave Me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took Me in: naked, and ye clothed Me: I was sick, and ye visited Me: I was in prison, and ye came unto Me" [Matthew 25:34-36].
